page.title: 08Maple Cross J.M.I. part 2
page.content: December 19th was the day of our Christmas dinner.We had our party the following day. We had a disco on the 25th January. We have these about 4 times a year. On 13th&14th February we had parents evenings. Quite{unlike}disco's we hate parents evenings! The 3rd years had several day trips. They have visited many interesting places.The nursery also went on a day trip to Cotswold wildlife park. On 22nd April-26th April our class went to Minehead.We all enjoyed it. We had our Mayday on the 8th May. The Maypole was very colourful. On the 22nd May we had a follow up evening displaying our Minehead work. The 1st June the 1st year went to Pearse House for the week.16th June was fete day.We raised Â£942.Sports day was 10th July;19th July the year ended
